alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Pasadena, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, eastern Pearland, western Baytown, northern Friendswood, Deer Park, South Houston, northwestern Seabrook, Galena Park, Webster, Clear Lake, South Belt / Ellington, Greater Hobby Area, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Shoreacres, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Harrisburg / Manchester, Park Place, Ellington Field and Houston Ship Channel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
